website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable bottles of almond oil you'll find without sacrificing quality.
pros: Features sweet almond oil with no additives
This lightweight, general-purpose oil is great as a carrier oil and to be used as a moisturizer for hair and skin
cons: The plastic bottle and squeeze top lid can leak

customer_reviews.title: Super great for skin!
customer_reviews.text: Every night I use this on my face and neck. After the first week of use, my skin looked rejuvenated and it glows. It also has help diminish the dark circles I get under my eyes from being fatigued. Note I have fair, sensitive skin and no reactions at all. I recommend this 110%.
customer_reviews.author: JRC914

customer_reviews.title: a great carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, quick shipping, a great carrier oil. I mix all my essential oils with this Sweet Almond OIl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this almond oil
customer_reviews.text: Love this almond oil. I added to lotions and creams for added moisture. I apply it everywhere and it does not leave a greasy residue.Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lunise Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil because it blends well with practically anything without an overpowering scent. I use it to make my own hair care products, body lotions and moisturizers. It works perfectly with essential oils as a carrier oil. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giles

customer_reviews.title: This is a great oil for everything from daily moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oil for everything from daily moisturizing, post-tanning soothingness, overnight hair moisturizer, adding to homemade concoctions, and rubdowns :D
customer_reviews.author: Sara Alsman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a general moisturizer for under eye and it is excellent for dark circles and lines.
customer_reviews.author: PMG

customer_reviews.title: Neutral and moisturizing oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is perfect if you're looking for something that has no scent and would like to add your own essential oils to it. I found it to be pretty moisturizing, and I tend to get eczema in the winter. It absorbs in the skin well, but it doesn't last as long as something like a lotion bar with shea butter and beeswax. It's somewhere in the middle if you want to describe the feel of it. Not super light, but not one of those really heavy oils makes you feel like you are going to slide off anything you touch. Would make a nice massage oil, too.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin709

customer_reviews.title: Great for massages
customer_reviews.text: I just converted to home made massage oil after my favorite product of 20 years was modified and was no longer acceptable. This oil is perfect for massages. It slides on nicely and does not feel greasy. It allows for a massage without drying out. And it is much cheaper than the massage oil products on the market. Added plus - mix in any essential oil and you have custom massage oil to match your mood or favorite fragrance. Plus, it is healthy for your skin. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Artizen Sweet Almond Oil
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to trying the sweet almond oil, however, I refused to accept delivery when I saw the box saturated in 16 oz. of dripping oil and wet. The package was delivered in a "basket" to catch the dripping oil! Glad I was home. It was clearly unacceptable. I would love to try the product but would be hesitant to try a mail order again.
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great for your skin, hair and nails. I add a few drops to my face and body creams or a warm bath for an added layer of moisturizing. Also, I mix in some strawberry scented oils for a quick substitute for a body fragrance. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle
customer_reviews.text: The bottle will leaking oil inside the bag it a mess but I can send it back
customer_reviews.author: Ms. E

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Almond Oil
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't Smell Like Anything. Sweet Almond Oil Has A Slight Sweet Smell Not Sure What Oil This Is.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess Brezzy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Oily with only a slight smell. Didn't really do much in way of helping wrinkles or crepe skin.
customer_reviews.author: ebastro

customer_reviews.title: We Love This!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying sweet almond oil and it's very nice! Good price, super soft and slippery but not greasy, so it's perfect for massage. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great for skin, smells great.
customer_reviews.text: The oil is great. Great smell, works well on skin. Although I use it for my aromatherapy burner. (But it did leak on the way here. Causing it to be repackaged and at least a few weeks late.)
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Branon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money-not almond oil
customer_reviews.text: This has very little almond oil if any in it at all! Smells and feels like castor oil. Not recommending this purchase at all!
customer_reviews.author: Focussquirrel

customer_reviews.title: Almost still the same...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this oil 3-4 times and this time the bottle is opaque brown and they stopped using the pop up dispenser cap. saving what 2 cents? I hope the contents are the same but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Hardsell

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Bottle in Shipping
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the bottle leaked and about 1/3 of the product had absorbed into the shipping box! For this reason, I have to give this only 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S.W. Sturtz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful oil. I use it to massage my scalp. I rub it in, put a shower cap on and let it penetrate the scalp, then I shampoo my hair after about an hour. My hair is soft and shiny. It’s a good buy as the bottle is big.
customer_reviews.author: Susan I. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seal was loose. I'm not sure I can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ludivina A Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: My kind of oil. highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have really sensitive skin, and I'm able to use this in my hair, on my skin, I remove my makeup with it, it leaves no smell.. this stuff is a dream to work with.
customer_reviews.author: TeeW

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth and odorless
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of any product of this sort. The bottle will last me a while. I purchased this on a whim as a carrier oil to begin dabbling with essential oils. So far I haven't been disappointed. It is silky and blends different oils together perfectly with adding any scent of its own.
customer_reviews.author: C Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell like Almond...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even smell like Almond Oil! So disappointed. That's why I bought it. Boo.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie from Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's the real thing but ....
customer_reviews.text: I can't smell any scent of Almond as I expected but decided to keep it anyway. However it does moisturize the skin and seems fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Armin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it for oiling our wood furniture. There is little to no scent. Lemon/orange oil makes me sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Judith H. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier oil hardly any fragrance to this at all
customer_reviews.text: Great carrier oil hardly any fragrance to this at all. Essential oils cover it completely. I use it to make roller ball mixes for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela1991

customer_reviews.title: questionable product
customer_reviews.text: This is not almond oil, at least not the kind I have used for the past 10 years. No smell, very oily

customer_reviews.title: leaked out and broken cap
customer_reviews.text: i loveeee almond oil but unfortunately this bottle came all leaked out with a broken cap and unsealed plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipping took a long time, it was well packaged and a very nice quality oil. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product I use when making my own moisturizer. Great product with a reasonable price

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: I've used grape seed in the past but I like this a little better
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Ralston

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I mix this almond oil with other natural oils to use on skin and as a hot oil treatment for my hair. It works well and moisturizes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant experience
customer_reviews.text: Really like this oil. Not only is it a carrier oil but you can use it directly on your skin. Feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Great oil for hair and body!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is perfect. We use it for after shower oil and for hair treatment, works like a charm. Nice soft, moisture retaining skin and hair, couldn't ask for more! Definitely continue to repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nightowl17

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It moisturizes well and leaves almost no oily feeling behind...
customer_reviews.author: Steven Falaska

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose oil, does the job it's meant for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a carrier oil for my essential oils in bath bombs and it works great. Then, my lips got very dry and chapped, so now I have additionlly purposed it for my chapped lips and it's working great!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa N Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This oil suits my skincare needs well and has a nice, gentle smell. It arrived well packaged and quickly. I'm very pleased with it. What more could I ask for? I'll be ordering again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Megadoodoo

customer_reviews.title: One of my favs
customer_reviews.text: Great oil, probably my favorite to keep on me and use for daily moisturizing

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing oil.

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious Almond oil

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier oil
customer_reviews.text: Nice almond oil. Used it as a carrier oil for my essential oils. I like it

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I typically buy almond oil by NOW products. This is a great alternative and I would buy this brand again. I use almond oil on my face with focus around my eyes. This has the same quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredient for homemade lotion
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old has awful dry skin especially behind the knees. I used this almond oil as a main ingredient in homemade lotion. My son skin is clearing and he loves lotion.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!

customer_reviews.text: Over all a good oil. I use it as a carrier oil for my essential oils and also to take makeup off. Works great at taking makeup off.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality

customer_reviews.title: Great oil!!

product_meta.title: Artizen Sweet Almond Oil - 16oz (Ounce) Bottle (100% Pure & Natural) - Perfect Carrier Oil for Diluting Essential Oils - Cold Pressed - Works Great as a Massage Oil, Aromatherapy, More!
product_meta.description: Sweet Almond Oil - 100% Pure - 16 Ounce Bottle
feature_bullets: PREMIUM GRADE 100% PURE SWEET ALMOND OIL – Our Sweet Almond Oil is Completely Natural with ZERO added fillers.

GET SOFT, SMOOTH, BEAUTIFUL SKIN – Sweet Almond Oil is Rich in Vitamin A, Vitamin B, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, as Well as Zinc & Calcium. These Nourish Your Skin and Help You Achieve Incredibly Smooth Soft Skin
THE BEST MASSAGE OIL – Our Sweet Almond Oil is Non-Greasy, Odorless, and Colorless. It’s Perfect for Massage Therapy or as a Personal Lubricant.
PERFECT CARRIER OIL FOR DILUTING ESSENTIAL OILS – Sweet Almond Oil is Completely Odorless, Thus making it an Amazing Carrier Oil for Diluting Any of Your Essential Oils!

LIFETIME WARRANTY AND GUARANTEE - The manufacturer, Artizen Essential Oils, offers a lifetime warranty and guarantee on their product. If you are ever unsatisfied for any reason they will replace your product or refund your money. And they stand behind and guarantee the purity of their oils.
